sig_info: Tireless research grants a benefit based on the opponent’s Class.
Science: 30 to 65% chance with each hit landed to Purify a Debuff.
Mystic: +13.65 to 45.5 Attack Rating and She-Hulk’s attacks cause the opponent to gain 20% less Power.
Cosmic: +6.37 to 13.65 Attack Rating for each Buff the opponent has.
Tech: Opponent suffers -15 to 55% Armor Up effect duration & Potency.
Mutant: Opponent suffers -20 to 50% Ability Accuracy during Special Attacks.

INDUCE PANIC: She-Hulk’s sharp intellect and overwhelming strength panics her foes, increasing their chance to launch a Special Attack by 15% for each of her personal Passive Fury effects.
PASSIVE: An enhanced immune system provides full immunity to the Poisons of the Battlerealm.
WHEN ATTACKED & WHEN ATTACKING: 11% chance to gain a Passive Fury effect, increasing attack by 31.85 for 8 seconds.
OPPONENT ACTIVATES A SPECIAL ATTACK: If the opponent doesn’t have a Class Advantage, She-Hulk refreshes the duration of all of her personal Passive Fury effects.
HEAVY ATTACKS: If the opponent is Unstoppable, this attack cannot be interrupted. If the attack lands, the Unstoppable effect is removed and She-Hulk gains a Passive Fury, increasing attack by 63.7 for 8 seconds.
Causes a Slow Debuff on the opponent for 12 seconds.
ALWAYS ACTIVE: Extensive weight training allows She-Hulk’s personal Passive Fury effects and all Stun Debuffs to last up to 50% longer, based on the size of her opponent. Larger opponents grant longer effects.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 100% chance to gain a Passive Fury effect, increasing attack by 31.85 for 8 seconds.
75% chance to Exhaust the opponent, reducing Critical Damage Rating by 61.54 for 10 seconds. The Opponent's Power Gain effects are also reduced by 25% for each Exhaustion Debuff on them.
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: 100% chance to inflict a Petrify Debuff of 115% Potency for 15 seconds.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: 100% chance to Stun for 3.50 second(s).
100% chance to inflict Weakness, decreasing the target's Attack by 65% for 14 seconds.

HEAVY ATTACKS: If the opponent is Unstoppable, this attack cannot be interrupted. If the attack lands, the Unstoppable effect is removed and She-Hulk gains a Passive Fury, increasing attack by 972.3 for 8 seconds.
Causes a Slow Debuff on the opponent for 12 seconds.
ALWAYS ACTIVE: Extensive weight training allows She-Hulk’s personal Passive Fury effects and all Stun Debuffs to last up to 50% longer, based on the size of her opponent. Larger opponents grant longer effects.
